game_description: Sail with this Yacht Ship Simulator Experience Features: Drive the ship Walk around the ship Control cabin Cabins Kitchen Living Room Outside Resting Areas Restrooms Enjoy the experience of the sea in a Luxury Yacht
review_1: As sad as it is to say this experience has poorly made graphics and textures, only the right hand can pick things up, there is nothing to do but drive the ship and throw random objects which the throwing isnt even satisfying. I love the concept and would have accepted even a basic version of what this promises but this release is sadly not anywhere near a point I could ever recommend it.
